Basic:
import { createSignal } from 'solid-js'
import { Switch, SwitchControl, SwitchLabel, SwitchThumb } from '@ark-ui/solid'

const Basic = () => (
  <Switch>
    <SwitchControl>
      <SwitchThumb />
    </SwitchControl>
    <SwitchLabel>Label</SwitchLabel>
  </Switch>
)
RenderProp:
import { createSignal } from 'solid-js'
import { Switch, SwitchControl, SwitchLabel, SwitchThumb } from '@ark-ui/solid'

const RenderProp = () => (
  <Switch>
    {(api) => (
      <>
        <SwitchControl>
          <SwitchThumb />
        </SwitchControl>
        <SwitchLabel>Feature is {api().isChecked ? 'enabled' : 'disabled'}</SwitchLabel>
      </>
    )}
  </Switch>
)
